creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
Default gamma in PNG is 2.2. sRGB images have a default of 2.4. We write sRGB 
images without setting the gamma which needs to be corrected.

creator: deweese@apache.org
text:
While the power curve in the sRGB transfer function is 2.4,
when you consider the linear foot the best fit 'single number'
gamma curve has an exponent of 2.2.
